title: FTP User Data Exfiltration
description: An insecure FTP server exposes sensitive user data. Discover the leak and retrieve the flag.
hints: Start by connecting to the FTP server using a basic FTP client.
Explore the directory structure to find interesting files.
The flag is in a file named 'flag.txt' in the home directory.
learningObjectives: Understand FTP server operations and potential misconfigurations.
Learn to explore and extract data from FTP directories.
